resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1064</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Surrealism and Art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Surrealism und kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Surrealism et art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Surrealism e arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Surrealism ed arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σουρεαλησμός και τέχνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Surrealism y arte</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The learners will describe the style of art known as Surrealism, choose an artist who adopted this style and trace his/her life. They will show how the artist's life and the culture or history of the time was reflected in the artist's work</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Surrealism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">culture. History</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anfänger beschreiben die Art der kunst 
bekannt als Surrealism, einen Künstler zu wählen, der diese Art 
annahm und seine/ihr Lebensdauer nachvollzieht. Sie zeigen, wie 
die Lebensdauer des Künstlers und die Kultur oder die Geschichte der 
Zeit in der Arbeit des Künstlers reflektiert wurden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants décriront le modèle de l'art 
connu sous le nom de Surrealism, choisir un artiste qui a adopté ce 
modèle et trace sa vie. Ils montreront comment la vie de 
l'artiste et la culture ou l'histoire du temps ont été reflétées 
dans le travail de l'artiste</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners descreverão o estilo da arte sabido 
como Surrealism, para escolher um artista que adote este estilo e siga
his/her vida. Mostrarão como a vida do artista e a cultura ou o
history do tempo foram refletidos no trabalho do artista</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti descriveranno lo stile dell'arte 
conosciuto come Surrealism, scegliere un artista che ha adottato 
questo stile e segue la sua vita. Mostreranno come la durata 
dell'artista e la coltura o la storia del tempo sono state riflesse 
nel lavoro dell'artista</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι θα περιγράψουν το ύφος της τέχνης γνωστό 
ως σουρεαλησμός, να επιλέξει έναν καλλιτέχνη που υιοθέτησε αυτό 
το ύφος και επισημαίνει τη ζωή του/της. Θα επιδείξουν πώς η
ζωή του καλλιτέχνη και ο πολιτισμός ή η ιστορία του χρόνου 
απεικονίστηκαν στην εργασία του καλλιτέχνη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los principiantes describirán el estilo del arte 
conocido como Surrealism, elegir a un artista que adoptó este estilo 
y rastree su vida. Mostrarán cómo la vida del artista y la 
cultura o la historia del tiempo fueron reflejadas en el trabajo del 
artista</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Surrealism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Surrealism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
